item.title: Noite
item.description: Nas estrelas procuro o conforto, o mesmo conforto que antes tinha, ao perder-me no brilho do teu olhar. Hoje, de dia, apenas sofro, e no anoitecer resisto, até que a noite me traga salvação, a salvação suave do luar. Agora, dois estrangeiros, separados por distâncias inconcebíveis, e, ainda assim, unidos pelo mesmo mar estrelado. Às vezes pergunto-me se te recordas de mim, se soltas um sorriso ao lembrar as minhas parvalhices,

item.title: Transformations
item.description: From seed to sapling, to tree, to bloom, to fruit. From plateau to grand canyon. From one unbroken landmass to scattered, glittering shards. Time keeps its cadence, yet we cradle yesterday as though tomorrow were a myth and, in a way it is, for by the time you truly see it, it has already slipped into memory’s wake. From apex to idle heir, we crown ourselves with dust the food-chain’s lonely summit

item.title: Reminiscing
item.description: Visiting all those places where we dreamed you’d be, Not feeling alone, but there’s an absence in me. I’ve made strides since then, and I hope you have too, Life’s path now clearer, confidence anew. Should fate once again intertwine our two lives, Let’s seize the chance, like old friends who survive. A toast to the memories, the laughter and tears, In each story, we’ll find echoes of our yesteryears.

item.title: Fading
item.description: Under the cherry blossoms my heart rests longing for someone it has never met. Waiting for the winds to sweep it away, Hoping one day it can finally stay. Wilting as each day slowly passes, thoughts of a better life close to none. Constantly comparing itself to the masses, just to find a disappointment to everyone. Full of ambitions and aspirations, aiming for words of validation, but never able to meet expectations.
